name: requestSendPTPCommand(_:outData:sendCommandDelegate:didSendCommand:contextInfo:)
desc: Sends a Picture Transfer Protocol (PTP) command to a camera asynchronously.
declaration:
func requestSendPTPCommand(_ command: Data, 
                   outData data: Data?, 
       sendCommandDelegate: Any, 
            didSendCommand selector: Selector, 
               contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
